headline.main: BRITISH MTB'S SINK FOUR ENEMY SHIPS; Torpedo Boats Bag Three Along Northeastern Peninsula at Tip of Tunisia SHELL GROUNDED PLANES Light Craft Destroy Merchant Vessel Under Escort off Sicily's South Coast

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, May 2 -- In audacious daylight attacks off Cap Bon Peninsula, British motor torpedo boats have sunk a large motor vessel and two mine sweepers and set a German Raumboot -- a large motor patrol boat -- afire, it was disclosed today.
abstract: shell Ger aircraft on Tunis beaches
